pair.intro: To add a Ring device Homey needs to be authenticated at Ring, please logon with your Ring account to do this.

auth.header: Log on with your Ring account
auth.warning: (Two-Factor Authentication is mandatory, this must be enabled at your Ring account!)
auth.success: The Ring App for Homey is successfully authenticated at Ring
auth.failed: Authentication failed, please check your credentials

settings.title: Your Ring devices in Homey
settings.intro: To use your Ring devices in Homey, Homey must be authenticated at Ring. Authentication is done while adding your first Ring device to Homey.
settings.info: The authentication state is shown above.You can use the Revoke Authentication button to revoke Homeys authentication at Ring.

auth.success: The Ring App for Homey is successfully authenticated at Ring
auth.action: You need to (re-)authenticate this app from the device maintenance function or add device wizard

devices.unauthenticated: Homey is no longer authenticated at Ring. Please use the repair function to reauthenticate
